example.text: Like I said during the hearing: we don't have a white supremacy problem, we have an illegal immigration problem. And the longer Biden refuses to lock down our border, the more complicit he is in trafficking children: An estimated 200,000 children have been trafficked at the border under the Biden Administration 70% of traffickers are of Latin American descent 60% of Latin American children who cross the border are caught by the cartels and exploited for child pornography or drug smuggling District Update I kicked off my first Saturday back in the district speaking at the Honor Ride Event at Tropicana Field in Saint Petersburg.

This bipartisan piece of legislation would ensure that out of the already-required physical training days each month for active duty service members, one of those days would be designated to self defense/combat training. As a veteran, I will always have the backs of our brave men and women who put everything on the line to defend our nation so that we can live in the strongest country in the world.

That is why I support this resolution. Mr. Speaker, if I can also add, to those of my colleagues that had mentioned the Kurds, our NATO ally Turkiye, who is not the best NATO ally, might I add, has deemed them a terrorist organization.
